verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Maschil. Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he whose transgression <S%H6588><s%> is forgiven <S%H5375><s%>, Whose sin <S%H2401><s%> is covered <S%H3680><s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> unto whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> imputeth <S%H2803><s%> not iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, And in whose spirit <S%H7307><s%> there is no guile <S%H7423><s%>.
When I kept silence <S%H2790><s%>, my bones <S%H6106><s%> wasted away <S%H1086><s%> Through my groaning <S%H7581><s%> all the day long <S%H3117><s%>.

For day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> was heavy <S%H3513><s%> upon me <S%H3955><s%>: My moisture was changed <S%H2015><s%> as with the drought <S%H2725><s%> of summer <S%H7019><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

I acknowledged <S%H3045><s%> my sin <S%H2403><s%> unto thee <S%H5771><s%>, And mine iniquity did I not hide <S%H3680><s%>: I said <S%H559><s%>, I will confess <S%H3034><s%> my transgressions <S%H6588><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And thou forgavest <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of my sin <S%H2403><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

For this let every one that is godly <S%H2623><s%> pray <S%H6419><s%> unto thee in a time <S%H6256><s%> when thou mayest be found <S%H4672><s%>: Surely when the great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> overflow <S%H7858><s%> they shall not reach unto him <S%H5060><s%>.

Thou art my hiding-place <S%H5643><s%>; Thou wilt preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from trouble <S%H6862><s%>; Thou wilt compass <S%H5437><s%> me about with songs <S%H7438><s%> of deliverance <S%H6405><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

I will instruct <S%H7919><s%> thee and teach <S%H3384><s%> thee in the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> thou shalt go <S%H3212><s%>: I will counsel <S%H3289><s%> thee with mine eye upon thee <S%H5869><s%>.

Be ye not as the horse <S%H5483><s%>, or as the mule <S%H6505><s%>, which have no understanding <S%H995><s%>; Whose trappings <S%H5716><s%> must be bit <S%H4964><s%> and bridle <S%H7448><s%> to hold <S%H1102><s%> them in <S%H1077><s%>, Else they will not come near unto thee <S%H7126><s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%> sorrows <S%H4341><s%> shall be to the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; But he that trusteth <S%H982><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> shall compass him about <S%H5437><s%>.
Be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and rejoice <S%H1523><s%>, ye righteous <S%H6662><s%>; And shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H3477><s%>, all ye that are upright in heart <S%H3820><s%>.
